translation.en: [man] I was there when everything changed.
translation.it: Io c'ero quanto tutto è cambiato.

translation.en: Forty years ago.
[man] It was our third world war, and humanity was determined to end itself.
translation.it: C'era la Terza guerra mondiale e gli umani si annientavano a vicenda.

translation.en: [man] Then, on the edge of annihilation,
an alien saved us.
[man] He smashed our tools of war.
translation.it: Distrusse i nostri strumenti di guerra.

translation.en: [man] He forced us to stop fighting,
and shut down World War III in one fucking day.
translation.it: e pose fine alla Terza Guerra Mondiale in un solo cazzo di giorno.

translation.en: We called him
[man] For the first time in history,
translation.it: Per la prima volta nella storia,

translation.en: world peace appeared possible.
translation.it: la pace nel mondo sembrava possibile.

translation.en: -Good evening, America. -Mom?
I'm award-winning journalist Van Dawson, and this is Van Dawson Tonight.
translation.it: Sono il giornalista pluripremiato Van Dawson e siete su Van Dawson Tonight.

translation.en: We eagerly await the 40th anniversary of Marvelous Man Day.
translation.it: Attendiamo con ansia il 40° anniversario di Marvelous Man.

translation.en: The day Marvelous Man appeared from the sky
translation.it: Il giorno in cui Marvelous Man ci è apparso dal cielo

translation.en: to single-handedly end World War III.
translation.it: e da solo ha posto fine alla Terza guerra mondiale.

translation.en: Will our first superhero
continue to remain staunchly neutral in human conflicts?
translation.it: continuerà a rimanere neutrale nei conflitti umani?

translation.en: Will he act against the expansionist hive mind Anubis?
translation.it: Affronterà la mente collettiva espansionista Anubis?

translation.en: Will he condemn President Nick Nukem's aggressive military rhetoric?
translation.it: Condannerà la retorica militare aggressiva del presidente Nick Nukem?

translation.en: We now go live to the Citadel of Justice,
where Marvelous Man is moments away from giving his yearly M Day address.
translation.it: dove tra pochi istanti Marvelous Man farà il suo consueto discorso.

translation.en: [man singing] M Day!
[man singing] M Day!
People of Earth…
this is Marvelous Man.
Come on! Come on! Check this out!
Look at that. That's my hero!
For four decades, I have protected you.
translation.it: Per quattro decenni, vi ho protetto.

translation.en: I saved you.
I don't feel anything.
I'm a prisoner in this bulletproof skin.
Why does Marvelous Man look so sad, Mom?
translation.it: Mamma, perché Marvelous Man è così triste?

translation.en: And when I close my eyes,
this is what I hear.
[man] Please, help me!
Why? Why didn't you save us?
translation.it: Perché? Perché non ci hai salvati?

translation.en: -[man] Why didn't you save us? -[woman] Where are you?
-[man] You're supposed to be our savior! -[woman] Where are you? Where are you?
translation.it: - Dovevi essere il nostro salvatore! - Dove sei?

translation.en: -Where are you? -[man] Our savior!
[Marvelous Man] If I sleep,
people die.
Real inspiring speech, Cal.
Wait, is…
is that caltronite?
No! [exhales]
[whispers] What?
I'm tired of hiding.
I'm tired.
So I've found my escape.
translation.it: Ora ho una via di fuga.

translation.en: No. Don't do this, Cal!
I found it.
-No! -What happened?
Mom!
-[The Speed] Cecilia? -[Cecilia] Yeah?
Are we live?
Marvelous Man is dead.
Clear my schedule.
What we have just witnessed
is obviously a dark day for mankind.
There are no words to properly express
what just happened
and what we have lost
as a nation,
as a species,
as a planet.
[man] Fatality.
[female computer] The Guardians of Justice will save you.
translation.it: I Guardiani della Giustizia vi salveranno.

translation.en: ♪ Abraham Lincoln can leave his bed ♪
translation.it: SIGILLO DEL PRESIDENTE DEGLI STATI UNITI

translation.en: My fellow Americans,
an immigrant from another planet came to our shores
translation.it: un immigrato da un altro pianeta è venuto tra noi

translation.en: and made not only a life for himself,
translation.it: e si è sì, rifatto una vita,

translation.en: but created a lasting legacy as well.
translation.it: ma ci lascia anche una grande eredità.

translation.en: In the wake of his death,
America will continue to protect the legacy of Marvelous Man.
translation.it: l'America continuerà a proteggere l'eredità di Marvelous Man.

translation.en: We will prevent the escalation of nuclear conflict.
translation.it: Eviteremo lo scoppio di un conflitto nucleare.

translation.en: We will curtail the homosexual epidemic that is gripping our great nation.
translation.it: Combatteremo l'epidemia omosessuale che attanaglia la nostra grande nazione.

translation.en: Asshole!
And I promise you that even with Marvelous Man gone,
translation.it: E posso assicurarvi che anche senza Marvelous Man,

translation.en: our enemies will continue to fear us.
translation.it: i nostri nemici continueranno a temerci.

translation.en: God bless you, and God bless America.
translation.it: Dio vi benedica e Dio benedica l'America.

translation.en: We're fucked, people!
Aw, Phil.
Now that Marvelous Man is gone, who is going to save us?
translation.it: Ora che Marvelous Man non c'è, chi ci salverà?

translation.en: People on the streets are going crazy. It's as if the whole world has…
translation.it: La gente per strada è impazzita. È come se il mondo intero

translation.en: has lost all hope.
[man] The year is 1960.
Marvelous Man has brought rapid technological advancement,
translation.it: Marvelous Man ha portato il progresso tecnologico

translation.en: causing social turmoil and an escalation of street-level violence.
translation.it: causando disordini sociali e violenza per le strade.

translation.en: [man] In this asphalt jungle, we join a lone vigilante, the Knight Hawk,
translation.it: In questa giungla d'asfalto, un giustiziere solitario, Knight Hawk,

translation.en: conducting a crusade against costumed crime kingpin The Demander.
translation.it: lotta contro un genio del crimine mascherato, The Demander.

translation.en: [man] In this moment of peril, a god aligned himself with a man.
translation.it: In quest'epoca buia, un dio e un uomo si alleano.

translation.en: Together, they would forge a friendship
that became the cornerstone of the Guardians of Justice.
translation.it: che diventa la pietra angolare dei Guardiani della Giustizia.

translation.en: [reporter] For our next segment,
an exclusive interview with the former CIA operative who stole a god's heart.
translation.it: un'intervista esclusiva con l'ex agente della CIA che rubò il cuore di un dio.

translation.en: America's princess, now America's widow,
translation.it: La principessa d'America, ora vedova d'America,

translation.en: And we're live in three, two…
translation.it: Siamo in diretta tra tre, due…

translation.en: Ms. Louis, you have my condolences.
The world shares your grief.
How are you processing what your husband has done?
translation.it: Come elabora il gesto di suo marito?

translation.en: He wouldn't do that.
He wouldn't do that to the world, to the Guardians,
translation.it: Né al mondo, né ai Guardiani

translation.en: to me.
I think there can be no question Marvelous Man committed suicide.
translation.it: Non ci sono dubbi. Marvelous Man si è suicidato.

translation.en: [Laura] You don't know what you're talking about.
translation.it: Lei non sa di che parla.

translation.en: I've been watching it and re-watching it over and over and over again.
translation.it: L'ho guardato e riguardato senza sosta.

translation.en: He was murdered.
Murdered?
[in Arabic] Shocking revelations from Marvelous Man's widow.
[in Hebrew] Was Marvelous Man murdered? We will investigate the allegations tonight at ten…
translation.it: Marvelous Man è stato ucciso? Indagheremo sull'accaduto stasera.

translation.en: [reporter in French] Suicide or murder?
The world demands answers. The last 24 hours have shaken our planet to its core.
translation.it: Le ultime 24 ore hanno scosso il pianeta.

translation.en: If you're right, then there's one question the world needs answered.
translation.it: Se fosse così, al mondo serve una risposta.

translation.en: Who, if anyone, killed Marvelous Man?
We need to hear from the Guardians of Justice,
and specifically from Marvelous Man's second-in-command.
translation.it: in particolare il braccio destro di Marvelous Man.

translation.en: Knight Hawk, where are you?
[Knight Hawk] Computer, call the Guardians.
King Tsunami here.
Speed here.
Mm. Awsome Man present.
Sorry. I'm eating a taco.
Black Bow here.
[Knight Hawk] With Marvelous Man gone, it's time to suit up,
translation.it: Senza Marvelous Man, è ora di indossare la tuta,

translation.en: assume control of the Guardians, and protect the planet.
translation.it: assumere il controllo dei Guardiani e proteggere il pianeta.

translation.en: [man] Golden Goddess!
[Knight Hawk] She's the princess of the god realm.
translation.it: La principessa del regno degli dei.

translation.en: [man] The Speed!
[Knight Hawk] The only person faster than Marvelous Man.
translation.it: L'unica persona più veloce di Marvelous Man.

translation.en: [man] Black Bow!
[Knight Hawk] Expert marksman
and reality star.
-[man] Blue-Scream! -[screaming]
[Knight Hawk] Whose sonic scream contains immense power.
translation.it: Il suo grido sonico racchiude un potere immenso.

translation.en: [man] King Tsunami!
[Knight Hawk] Overlord of the oceans.
[man] Awsome Man!
[Knight Hawk] Who possesses a magic word that gives him the power of seven gods.
translation.it: Possiede una parola magica che gli conferisce il potere di sette dei.

translation.en: Together, we form the Guardians of Justice.
translation.it: Insieme, siamo i Guardiani della Giustizia.

translation.en: With Marvelous Man gone,
there's a power vacuum that could rip this world apart.
translation.it: il vuoto di potere rischia di distruggere il mondo.

translation.en: We can't have that happen.
Yeah. How are we gonna do that? All of us combined are not equal to Marvelous Man.
translation.it: Che faremo? Marvelous Man era migliore di tutti noi messi insieme.

translation.en: Speak for yourself, human.
Oh, come on. Don't fight. You're a fucking fish.
translation.it: - Non litigate. - Sei un pesce, cazzo.

translation.en: What can you do? You can talk to fish. "Oh, wow! I'm so fucking powerful!"
translation.it: Che sai fare? Parli coi pesci. "Oh, wow! Sono potentissimo!"

translation.en: Pathetic street whore. I'm a king, and I demand respect!
translation.it: Zitta, puttanella. Sono un re e pretendo rispetto!

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] Enough!
You're supposed to be role models. Heroes.
translation.it: Dovreste essere dei modelli, degli eroi.

translation.en: Try and act like it.
Blue-Scream's right.
None of us compare to Marvelous Man.
translation.it: Nessuno di noi è paragonabile a Marvelous Man.

translation.en: But if we work together as a team,
translation.it: Ma se lavoriamo insieme, in squadra,

translation.en: we could save this world.
We can honor our fallen Guardian.
We could strive to be
marvelous.
Everyone knows Marvelous Man didn't just protect a city or a town.
translation.it: Tutti sanno che Marvelous Man non proteggeva solo una città.

translation.en: He protected the world.
Now that's on us.
Awsome Man, Speed, Golden Goddess,
you're the only ones fast enough to handle an international crisis.
translation.it: avete la velocità che serve per una crisi internazionale.

translation.en: There's a squad of cyborg T-Rexes on the loose in Syria.
translation.it: C'è una squadra di cyborg T-Rex a piede libero in Siria.

translation.en: Take them down and bring them to justice.
Consider it done.
[Knight Hawk] A massive mudslide has thousands trapped and dying.
translation.it: Un'enorme colata di fango fa migliaia di vittime.

translation.en: Awsome Man, the Red Cross needs you in Thailand.
translation.it: Awesome Man, la Croce Rossa ha bisogno di te in Tailandia.

translation.en: The Hawk drones will back you up with supplies.
[Hawk drone] Activate.
You can count on me.
[Knight Hawk] Speed, I need you to pick up Blue-Scream and drop him in LA.
translation.it: Speed, preleva Blue-Scream e portalo a Los Angeles.

translation.en: A new street drug called "Mellow Devil" is causing people to lose their minds.
translation.it: Una nuova droga di strada chiamata Mellow Devil fa impazzire la gente.

translation.en: -We've got to extinguish the fires. -You got it.
He can't do that alone. I should go with him.
translation.it: Da solo non ce la farà. Vado con lui.

translation.en: -I'll be fine. Speed, let's go. -I'm on my way.
translation.it: - Ce la farò. Speed, andiamo. - Arrivo subito.

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] Wait, Speed!
After you've dropped Scream in LA, I need you to get back here,
translation.it: Dopo aver accompagnato Scream a L.A., torna qui,

translation.en: because we've gotta get Black Bow to Peru.
translation.it: perché Black Bow deve andare in Perù.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. What am I, the Guardians' delivery boy?
translation.it: Cosa sono, il fattorino dei Guardiani?

translation.en: You're whatever the Guardians need you to be. Now, move!
translation.it: Sei quello di cui c'è bisogno. Muoviti!

translation.en: And me?
[Knight Hawk] The Scottish Skull has hijacked an American submarine off the coast of New Zeamar.
translation.it: Scottish Skull ha dirottato un sottomarino americano al largo di New Zeamar.

translation.en: Walker! How did you break this feed?
translation.it: Walker! Come hai fatto a interrompere la trasmissione?

translation.en: Despite what you'd like to believe, Atticus, there are people smarter than you.
translation.it: Ti sembrerà impossibile, Atticus, ma c'è gente più intelligente di te.

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] Addison Walker.
She runs a private military group funded by a few dozen corporations.
translation.it: Gestisce un gruppo militare privato finanziato da decine di società.

translation.en: Her objective? Maintain global economic stability at all cost.
translation.it: Il suo obiettivo? Mantenere stabilità economica globale a tutti i costi.

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] She's playing chess and only she gets to see the board.
translation.it: Gioca una partita di scacchi in cui è l'unica a vedere la scacchiera.

translation.en: What do you want?
As you know, Marvelous Man was leading negotiations
translation.it: Come sai, Marvelous Man gestiva i negoziati

translation.en: for a worldwide nuclear disarmament.
Since his death, those negotiations have spun out of control.
translation.it: Dalla sua morte, i negoziati sono andati fuori controllo.

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] That sounds like your problem,
not mine.
Oh. It's going to become everyone's problem soon.
translation.it: Presto sarà un problema di tutti.

translation.en: Because of the questions surrounding Marvelous Man's death,
translation.it: A causa dei dubbi sulla morte di Marvelous Man,

translation.en: every country is pointing the finger at one another.
translation.it: tutti i Paesi si puntano il dito contro.

translation.en: China is saying Russia had him killed.
translation.it: La Cina dice che l'abbia fatto uccidere la Russia.

translation.en: Iran and Iraq are sure the job was done by the Americans.
translation.it: Iran e Iraq sono certi che sia stata opera degli americani.

translation.en: That doesn't even make sense.
The steps that lead us to war rarely do.
translation.it: Le cause delle guerre raramente ne hanno.

translation.en: The only way this ends without an all-out nuclear holocaust
translation.it: L'unico modo per evitare un olocausto nucleare perfetto

translation.en: is if you find out who really killed Marvelous Man.
translation.it: è che voi scopriate chi ha ucciso Marvelous Man.

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] So you don't think it was a suicide?
translation.it: Tu non credi sia stato suicidio?

translation.en: I don't.
But from what I hear, neither do you.
translation.it: Ma da quanto ho sentito, neanche tu.

translation.en: I don't have an opinion.
And I won't have an opinion until my investigation is completed.
translation.it: E non ne avrò finché non avrò finito di indagare.

translation.en: Yes, but I know the problem is you're looking in the wrong place.
translation.it: Sì, ma so che il problema è che stai cercando nel posto sbagliato.

translation.en: Are you fucking with me or what?
translation.it: Mi stai prendendo per il culo?

translation.en: You need to look at the Guardians themselves.
The Guardians? What do you know that I don't?
translation.it: I Guardiani? Che sai che io non so?

translation.en: [Walker] Time is running short. Find the answer.
translation.it: Il tempo stringe. Trova la risposta.

translation.en: Or I'll arrest you and every one of your super friends before declaring martial law
translation.it: O arresterò te e i tuoi super amici e poi farò scattare la legge marziale

translation.en: on the world.
Knight Hawk to Guardians.
Complete your mission
and report to the Hawk's Nest.
translation.it: e fate rapporto al Nido del Falco.

translation.en: Jesus Christ!
That's fucked up, man.
I know. I know. But think about it.
translation.it: Lo so, ma pensaci un attimo.

translation.en: Marvelous Man is dead. Right? Huh?
So, you think if we wore his skin, we'd be bulletproof?
translation.it: Pensi che se indossassimo la sua pelle, diventeremmo antiproiettile?

translation.en: I mean, I guess. I-it's like a bulletproof jacket. You know?
translation.it: Immagino di sì. È come un giubbotto antiproiettile.

translation.en: It… it still goes through. It hurts like shit.
translation.it: Comunque passano e fa un male cane.

translation.en: [officer 2 laughing] No, it doesn't! At least, I think it doesn't. Shit. I mean…
translation.it: No, non è così. Almeno, non credo.

translation.en: 'Cause his whole body is bulletproof. It's impenetrable, man. All right?
translation.it: Tutto il corpo è a prova di proiettile. È impenetrabile.

translation.en: If you wore his skin, you'd still be a doughboy with shit muscles.
translation.it: Anche con la sua pelle, resteresti tutta ciccia e niente muscoli.

translation.en: [officer 2] Oh, fuck you. Fuck you. You know how much I've been lifting.
[officer 1] Yeah, yeah. You're lifting beer and donuts, man.
-That still counts. -[officer 1] Yeah. In your world.
[officer 2] What's the count at?
[officer 1] Three and a half. Look at this one.
-[officer 2] Smiley face? -[officer 1] Uh-huh.
-[officer 2] Shit. -[officer 1] Oh, well…
[officer 2] Another smiley face.
[officer 1] Oh, okay. Look at this one here.
[officer 2] Fucking ground beef. [officer 1] How's that wife of yours, man?
translation.it: - Carne macinata, cazzo. - Ehi, come sta tua moglie?

translation.en: [officer 2] She's good. She's a little stressed out.
translation.it: Sta bene. È un po' stressata.

translation.en: Kid had an accident. You know?
translation.it: Il bambino ha avuto un incidente.

translation.en: -[officer 1] Yeah? -[officer 2] Yeah.
[officer 1 scoffs] Hey, when it rains, it pours.
[officer 2] Tell me about it. I'm missing that single life though.
translation.it: Non dirlo a me. Mi manca la vita da single.

translation.en: [officer 1] Yeah. Look at this one here. The eyeball's out.
translation.it: Guarda questo. Il bulbo oculare è uscito.

translation.en: [officer 1] Single life? You are missing it.
translation.it: Ti manca la vita da single?

translation.en: -Hey, I forgot to ask you… -[officer 1] What?
-[officer 2] Another smiley face. -[officer 1] Yeah.
[officer 2] How was that… how was that date the other night?
translation.it: Com'è andata l'altra sera con quella?

translation.en: [officer 1] What date? Oh, yeah! The one with the big old…?
[officer 2] Yeah, the tig old bitties.
Oh, man, she was… Crazy, but she was nice.
translation.it: Mamma mia, una pazza… Ma carina.

translation.en: [officer 2] Yeah. I fucking love titties, man.
translation.it: Quanto mi piacciono le tette, cazzo.

translation.en: [officer 1] I know you do.
Oh. Look at this. Oh sh--
-Stinks! -[officer 2] That smells like shit, man.
translation.it: - Che puzza! - Che puzza di merda.

translation.en: -[officer 1] Oh, man! -[officer 2] Fucking maggots and shit.
[officer 1] Oh, yeah.
[officer 1] Oh. Look at this one.
[exhales, whispers] Shit.
Got a splitting headache, I guess. I don't know.
translation.it: Deve avere un gran mal di testa.

translation.en: That's disgusting.
[officer 1] Check this one out here.
-[officer 2] That's not right, man. -[officer 1] Oh, man. Faceless.
translation.it: - Non ci siamo, amico. - Cavolo, senza faccia.
